title: Telegram Founder Pavel Durov Arrested in France for Content Moderation Failures
description: Pavel Durov, founder and chief executive of the popular messaging app Telegram, was arrested in France on Saturday, according to French television network TF1. Durov is believed to have been apprehended pursuant to a warrant issued in connection with a preliminary police investigation.
